name: Trustworks
description: Trustworks empowers creator economy through its flagship creator-centric ecosystem "Trustvibes". TrustVibes is building a fully immersive and interactive digital world accessible to everyone. It offers social and virtual experiences to passion economy creators introducing world's 1st Gamified Creator System. Mobile App A campaign and community management tool to start your creator journey. Marketplace A monetization tool to monetize your creative work. TrustVerse Enables passion economy creators in the metaverse revolution.
